community.name: Data Science
community.description: The Data Science Community is the primary community for the Data Den, the parent for many data science collections.

community.name: Xymurgy
community.description: The Xymurgy Community contains collections of concern to brewmeisters and the science of making beer.

community.name: Library
community.description: The Library Community contains collections of material held and or curated by the UCLA Library.
